section.heading: Requirements for Approval.
section.text: An applicant for a center offering care to children attending a middle school shall:

para.text: Meet the requirements of this subtitle; or
Submit to and receive prior approval from the office of a written plan of operation for the center that meets the intent of the requirements of this subtitle; and
Operate according to the approved plan.

section.heading: Plan of Operation.
section.text: A plan of operation submitted pursuant to Regulation .01 of this chapter shall include:

para.text: A definition of the population to be served and the criteria for admission;
Center staffing information and a staffing pattern for the program at the center;
The space, materials, equipment, and furnishings to be used at the center;
The days and hours of operation;
Locations other than the center which will be used for activities;
Activities to be held at locations other than the center;
A method of accounting for children's whereabouts;
A method for assuring parental approval for activities held at locations other than the center;
A method for having a consistent staff member available to each child;
A transportation plan, if necessary; and
